citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection the principal owner was not available, therefore the records for acquisition and disposition of
animals as well as the program of veterinary care could not be reviewed.
Licensee needs to establish a system whereby records can be reviewed in his absence in order to insure compliance with
the regulations.
Correct from this day 818/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of inspection the principal owner was not available, therefore the records for acquisition and disposition of 
animals as well as the program of veterinary care could not be reviewed. 
Licensee needs to establish a system whereby records can be reviewed in his absence in order to insure compliance with 
the regulations. 
Correct from this day 818/2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative 
 
End Section
